pageProduct.name: QV Face Gentle Cleanser 250G
pageProduct.description:
General Information

This gentle and lightly foaming facial cleanser is ideal for dry and sensitive skin types. Use morning and night for a healthy glow and soft, supple skin.

Warnings

CAUTION: For external use only.  If lather enters eyes, flush well with water.  Store below 25°C.
Always read the label. Use only as directed.
If symptoms persist please see your healthcare professional.

Common Uses

• Added moisturisers help protect your skin against drying effects of cleansing or moisture loss during cleansing, while vitamin E provides antioxidant benefits.
• Gently cleanses the delicate face and neck area.
• Maintains skin’s protective properties and doesn’t strip away natural oils like soap can.
• pH-balanced, low-irritant formulation, free from fragrance, colour, lanolin and propylene glycol.

Ingredients

Aqua (water), petrolatum (soft withe paraffin), sodium laureth sulfate, carthamus tinctorius (safflower oil) glycerin, lauryl betaine, xanthan gum, guar hydroxypropyltrimonium chloride, tocopherol (Vitamin E), hydrobenzoates, dodium polyacrylate, citric

Directions

Use morning and night. Moisten face with water. Lather a small amount of cleanser on hands then gently massage onto face and neck. Rinse thoroughly with clean water. Follow with QV Face Moisturising Day Cream in the morning and QV Face Nurturing Night Cream at night.
